appsgate.lig.enocean.ubikit.adapter
Class UbikitAdapter

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.enocean.ubikit.adapter.UbikitAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnOceanPairingService, EnOceanService, org.ubikit.event.EventListener, org.ubikit.pem.event.ItemAddedEvent.Listener, org.ubikit.pem.event.ItemAddingFailedEvent.Listener, org.ubikit.pem.event.NewItemEvent.Listener, org.ubikit.pem.event.UnsupportedNewItemEvent.Listener, org.ubikit.PhysicalEnvironmentModelObserver
public class UbikitAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.ubikit.PhysicalEnvironmentModelObserver, EnOceanService, EnOceanPairingService, org.ubikit.pem.event.NewItemEvent.Listener, org.ubikit.pem.event.ItemAddedEvent.Listener, org.ubikit.pem.event.UnsupportedNewItemEvent.Listener, org.ubikit.pem.event.ItemAddingFailedEvent.Listener

This class is used to connect the ubikit system to the ApAM environment. An object of this class translate "NewItemEvent" to ApAM instances with the adapted ApAM implementation. This class it is also an OSGi/iPOJO bundle, that provide two services and instanciate itself automatically.

Since:
January 8, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard
See Also:
EnOceanPairingService, EnOceanService
